powermeter/display_unit/init.c

00001 #include <stdio.h>
00002 #include <avr/io.h>
00003 #include <stdlib.h>
00004 #include <avr/interrupt.h>
00005 
00006 #include "main.h"
00007 
00008 void init_ports(void) {
00009         DDRA = 0xFF;
00010         DDRB = 0xFF;
00011         DDRC = 0xFF;
00012         DDRD = 0xE8;
00013         DDRE = 0x9E;
00014         DDRF = 0x1C;
00015         DDRG = 0x1F;
00016 }
00017 
00018 void init_backlight_contrast(void) {
00019         TCCR3A = (1<<COM3A1) | (0<<COM3A0) | (0<<WGM31) | (1<<WGM30);// | (1<<COM3B1) | (0<<COM3B0);
00020         TCCR3B = (0<<WGM33) | (1<<WGM32) | (0<<CS32) | (1<<CS31) | (0<<CS30);
00021         TCCR3C = 0;
00022         OCR3AH = 0;
00023         OCR3AL = (DEFAULT_BACKLIGHT)*2.55f;
00024         
00025         //OCR3BH = 0;
00026         //OCR3BL = 0x10;
00027 }
